basic_info.description: My name is Emmanuel, a Law graduate(South Africa) and Masters in Law drop-out (I was very close to graduating, but didn't see myself pursuing a career in law), Software Engineer and Entrepreneur. I love being physically active and building tech solutions to solve real world problems. As an entrepreneur I have built startups, raised capital from angel investors and helped people start their careers. This experience has made me a strong collaborative self-starter who builds features and optimizes products based on user feedback.

projects.title: Pair Programming Platform
projects.description: A pair programming matching pairs of users who are then redirected to a programming session where they can collaboratively solve a programming challenge using a shared code editor over an audio call. Browse through the images above to see a few of the features I built
projects.three_description: Synchronizing States to make paired users share code editor
projects.four_description: Blog: Building code editor and initiating Twilio Conference Call
projects.five_description: Matching and redirecting users to pair programming session
projects.six_description: Synchronizing States between two clients enabling users to share code editor
projects.seven_description: Retrieving programming challenge and synchronizing states, ensuring paired users see the same challenge

projects.title: Boxing Web Prediction App
projects.description: A web app using machine learning to predict the possible outcome of a boxing match for over 5000 boxers, using data scraped from multiple sources
projects.three_description: Blog Post: How I built a boxing prediction web app using Shiny
projects.four_description: How I built an Interactive Dashboard to visualize boxing data

projects.title: Evaluating the efficacy of marketing campaigns
projects.description: Built a data pipeline using Luigi automating the process of extracting and cleaning up data using SQL and building a Monte Carlo Markov Chain to evaluate the conversion rates of marketing campaigns by day, time and channel
projects.one_description: Blog Post explaining the process of this build

projects.title: Code Race
projects.description: An MVP for a gamified code editor helping users improve their coding skills by solving as many easy leetcode questions as they can within 25 minutes

experience.title: Full Stack Developer (Volunteer)
experience.description: Pair programmed on React website for a Non Profit and optimized mobile responsiveness features with CSS. Built out user authentication functionality, and conditionally rendered sidebar components using Node.js and Okta

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Built a startup and developed a curriculum training Data Science talent in Africa through live mentorship with experienced Data Scientists at no cost, recovering income through recruitment fees; Raised funding from two angel investors in Africa. Trained over 120 students with 50% securing internships and full time jobs

experience.title: Business Intelligent Analyst
experience.description: Built dashboards and used SQL to help evaluate the efficiency of marketing campaigns and aiding in fraud detection for over $55 million in monthly transactions

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Built dashboards collating data to help one of the big 5 Banks in South Africa  get insights to drive marketing efforts

experience.title: Intern Analyst, LCS Team
experience.description: Carried out data analysis on emerging tech ecosystems in Africa supporting Google branches in Africa in restructuring their strategic goal to increase revenue from Video ads
